meanings.definition: Located near or at the end of something.
meanings.sent1: The subterminal flower bloomed beautifully at the tip of the stem.
meanings.sent2: The subterminal bus stop was the last one on the route.
meanings.sent3: The subterminal cookie in the jar was the last one left for me to enjoy.
meanings.sent4: Her subterminal decision to leave the party early surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The subterminal piece of the puzzle was crucial to completing the picture.

meanings.definition: A point or part that is near the end of something.
meanings.sent1: The bird's subterminal tail feather was longer than the rest.
meanings.sent2: The subterminal of the movie revealed the unexpected twist.
